mapper.sql: order_id, order_number, order_type, order_status, order_label, customer_id, employee_id, order_price, order_remark, create_user_id, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.order_number, o.order_type, o.order_status, o.order_label, o.customer_id, o.employee_id, o.order_price, o.order_remark, o.create_user_id, o.create_time, c.customer_name as customerName, c.customer_phone as customerPhone, c.customer_wx_number as customerWxNumber, u.nick_name AS employeeName FROM lm_order o LEFT JOIN lm_customer c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON o.employee_id = u.user_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lm_order ( order_number, order_type, order_status, order_label, customer_id, employee_id, order_price, order_remark, create_user_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNumber}, #{orderType}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderLabel}, #{customerId}, #{employeeId}, #{orderPrice}, #{orderRemark}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime} )
